column4: so I put a menubar on top of another menubar and told it to autohide, in gnome. now whenever I try to log in I crash. can anybody tell me what I have to delete (I only have xterm access) to set the ap bar thingies back to default? hopefully that will keep me from crashing on login
can someone at least tell me the gnome channel name? if I bring up the channel browser I can't minimize it again...
thanks. need to close irc to do it
